name: Sacrifice
description: GOG version. Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above).

files.game: N/A:Select the Sacrifice installer provided by GOG.

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Sacrifice/Sacrifice.exe
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Sacrifice installer provided by GOG.
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
